attributes.action: ...leave office while he still has any vestige of self respect left
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This country has no respect left for the Prime Minister. His views are not repected nor wanted. He should resign and leave office immediately.

His Government has brought about the downfall of any form of morality in this country and he should not be rewarded with a peerage for such an utterly disgraceful premiership.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
